headline: International Private Equity Team Heron View Partners Announces Firm Launch
summary: Heron View Partners ("HVP"), a private equity platform and investment firm specializing in global middle market investments, has commenced operations as a standalone entity under the purview of Hong Kong-based holding company Pacific Century Group ("PCG").
